DOC.brief_title: Surgical Outcome Vitrectomy Myopic Traction Maculopathy Highly Myopic Eyes
DOC.detailed_description: Surgical outcome vitrectomy myopic traction maculopathy highly myopic eye evaluate stage macular retinischisis , foveal detachment , macular hole . Efficacy internal limiting membrane also evaluate whether may improve visual outcome .
DOC.criteria: Eyes myopic traction maculopathy highly myopic eye refractive error ≤ 8.0 diopter axial length ≥ 26.0 mm underwent vitrectomy Eyes followup less year
